document_data.name: Highsun Liqueur
document_data.mainbody: '''Highsun Liqueur''' was a [[druid]]ic alcoholic drink found in the [[Western Heartlands]], the lands along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Highsun Liqueur was brewed using various [[herb]]s picked during summer solstice â€“ [[Kythorn 20]]. Druids believed that this liquor cleansed the imbiber's spirit from the previous season's sins and sickness and was said to aid digestion.
